page.title: 08Emborough Amenities
page.content: Emborough has few amenities within its boundaries, but there is a good grocey store, a butchers shop and a post office in nearby chilcompton. Larger shops are not too far away in either Bath or Wells. An hourly bus service passes near to Emborough from Wells to Bath and a daily coach from Bath to London stops at Chilcompton. A mobile library calls at Emborough fortnightly and visit can be made to libraries at Wells, Bath and Midsomer Norton. Children in the area attend eiher chilcompton then Midsomer Norton schools or Chewton Mendip then Wells depending on where they reside. A doctor can be found in Chilcompton and cottage hospitals are situated in Wells and Paulton. There is a geneal hospital at Bath and dentists surgeries at Midsomer Norton and Wells.
